verses.verse: And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G455>broke<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4973>seals,<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> as with a <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder,<s%> <S%G2064>"Come.<s%>"

And I <S%G3708>looked,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2462>horse,<s%> and he who <S%G2521>sat<s%> on it <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G5115>bow;<s%> and a <S%G4735>crown<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him; and he <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G3528>conquering,<s%> and to <S%G3528>conquer.<s%>

And <S%G243>another,<s%> a <S%G4450>red<s%> <S%G2462>horse,<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out; and to him who <S%G2521>sat<s%> on it, it was <S%G1325>granted<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> from the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and that [men] should <S%G4969>slay<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another;<s%> and a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3162>sword<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him.

And <S%G3753>when<s%> He <S%G455>broke<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G4973>seal,<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2064>"Come.<s%>" And I <S%G3708>looked,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G3189>black<s%> <S%G2462>horse;<s%> and he who <S%G2521>sat<s%> on it <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G2218>pair<s%> of <S%G2218>scales<s%> in his <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> as it were a <S%G5456>voice<s%> in the <S%G3319>center<s%> of the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "A <S%G5518>quart<s%> of <S%G4621>wheat<s%> for a <S%G1220>denarius,<s%> and <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G5518>quarts<s%> of <S%G2915>barley<s%> for a <S%G1220>denarius;<s%> and do not <S%G91>harm<s%> the <S%G1637>oil<s%> and the <S%G3631>wine.<s%>"

And <S%G3753>when<s%> He <S%G455>broke<s%> the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G4973>seal,<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2064>"Come.<s%>"

And I <S%G3708>looked,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> an <S%G5515>ashen<s%> <S%G2462>horse;<s%> and he who <S%G2521>sat<s%> on it had the <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2288>Death;<s%> and <S%G86>Hades<s%> was <S%G190>following<s%> with him. And <S%G1849>authority<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to them <S%G1909>over<s%> a <S%G5067>fourth<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> with <S%G4501>sword<s%> and with <S%G3042>famine<s%> and with <S%G2288>pestilence<s%> and by the <S%G2342>wild<s%> <S%G2342>beasts<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> He <S%G455>broke<s%> the <S%G3991>fifth<s%> <S%G4973>seal,<s%> I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G5270>underneath<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%> the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who had been <S%G4969>slain<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G2192>maintained;<s%>

and they <S%G2896>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2193>"How<s%> <S%G2193>long,<s%> <S%G4219><s%> O <S%G1203>Lord,<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> and <S%G228>true,<s%> wilt Thou <S%G3756>refrain<s%> from <S%G2919>judging<s%> and <S%G1556>avenging<s%> our <S%G129>blood<s%> on <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%>?"

And there was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G1538>each<s%> of them a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>robe;<s%> and they were <S%G3004>told<s%> that they should <S%G373>rest<s%> for a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>while<s%> <S%G2089>longer,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> [the number of] their <S%G4889>fellow<s%> <S%G4889>servants<s%> and their <S%G80>brethren<s%> who were to be <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as they had been, should be <S%G4137>completed<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

And I <S%G3708>looked<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> He <S%G455>broke<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G4973>seal,<s%> and there was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake;<s%> and the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3189>black<s%> as <S%G4526>sackcloth<s%> [made] of <S%G5155>hair,<s%> and the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4582>moon<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G129>blood;<s%>

and the <S%G792>stars<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> to the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> as a <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G906>casts<s%> its <S%G3653>unripe<s%> <S%G3653>figs<s%> when <S%G4579>shaken<s%> by a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G417>wind.<s%>

And the <S%G3772>sky<s%> was <S%G673>split<s%> <S%G673>apart<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G975>scroll<s%> when it is <S%G1667>rolled<s%> up; and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> and <S%G3520>island<s%> were <S%G2795>moved<s%> out of their <S%G5117>places.<s%>

And the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and the <S%G3175>great<s%> <S%G3175>men<s%> and the <S%G5506>commanders<s%> and the <S%G4145>rich<s%> and the <S%G2478>strong<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1401>slave<s%> and <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G1658>man,<s%> <S%G2928>hid<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> in the <S%G4693>caves<s%> and <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G4073>rocks<s%> of the <S%G3735>mountains;<s%>

and they <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountains<s%> and to the <S%G4073>rocks,<s%> <S%G4098>"Fall<s%> on us and <S%G2928>hide<s%> us from the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of Him who <S%G2521>sits<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and from the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb;<s%>
for the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of their <S%G3709>wrath<s%> has <S%G2064>come;<s%> and <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2476>stand<s%>? "
